ygData.subject: Re: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: some of what you said was my point, Naggy is upgraded, Vox is upgraded, Innoruk (he s the one with DT, right?) is upgraded.  They did this because they were
ygData.messageBody:
some of what you said was my point, Naggy is upgraded, Vox is upgraded,
Innoruk (he's the one with DT, right?) is upgraded. They did this
because they were dying too easily. This is all fine and good for
people who have been there before, and have plane/dragon equipment and
plane/dragon experience. (Actually its not, but at least you had a shot
at it) By the time we get there, there will be no chance. We will not
be lvl 50 before expansion, I cant imagine what Verant is going to do to
all those guys then...

When I say these things, I'm not trying to rail on the lvl 50's. If I
hadn't left EQ from May till November, I'd be a lvl 50 warrior with my
regular group from back then. (They all hit lvl 50 in Sept I think). I
just get annoyed when I see the future things I have been looking
forward to (dragons especially) being made untouchable to the slow
leveling people. To be honest all the high levels being bored is
speeding my level progress right now, as they are often around to help
me when I do something stupid (like die deep in Befallen) and they (at
least for me) are often genrorous with equipment...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
